name: Awesome Library
description: A powerful, type-safe utility library for modern JavaScript applications. Provides optimized functions for data manipulation, async operations, and common development tasks. Used by thousands of developers worldwide.

name: Real-time Collaboration Platform
description: Enterprise-grade collaborative editing platform enabling teams to work together in real-time. Features include operational transformation, conflict resolution, presence awareness, and role-based access control.

name: Client Project Alpha
description: Enterprise application for financial services with advanced reporting, analytics, and compliance features.

name: UI Component Kit
description: Fully accessible React component library with 50+ components, dark mode support, and comprehensive documentation. Built with accessibility and developer experience in mind.

name: API Gateway Service
description: High-performance API gateway handling authentication, rate limiting, request routing, and monitoring for microservices architecture. Processes 10M+ requests daily.

name: Developer Tools CLI
description: Command-line tool for automating common development workflows including project scaffolding, code generation, and deployment tasks. Downloaded 50K+ times.

name: E-commerce Platform
description: Full-featured e-commerce solution with product management, shopping cart, payment integration, and order tracking. Handles $1M+ in annual transactions.

name: Analytics Dashboard
description: Real-time analytics and monitoring dashboard with customizable widgets, data visualization, and alerting capabilities. Processes millions of events daily.
